messages.messageBody:
Hmmm he loves monkeys.maybe animal magazines.





Happily Married...Intentionally parenting....

Thankfully Homeschooling...

and Blessedly running my own Childcare Business!



Check out my blog :)

http://nikkisramblings.blogspot.com/

-----Original Message-----
From: unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com
[mailto:unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com] On Behalf Of
maryking1212@...
Sent: Friday, March 14, 2008 11:17 AM
To: unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [unschoolingbasics] RE: lurker but love this list



My son, Kalel, 9, always used to say he didn't like to read. His sister got
Kingdom Hearts and Kingdom Hearts 2 for Christmas and dad went out and
bought the manuals for both games when he got stuck on a certain level. He
was so excited that Dad got him some help, he has read both of them 300+
pages, over and over again, learning all of the secrets of the games. He
also runs to the mailbox to see if his WWE magazine is here yet. He loves to
read that too.
--
Mary King
www.unschoolingsupermom.blogspot.com





[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.messageBody:
My son, Kalel, 9, always used to say he didn’t like to read. His sister got Kingdom Hearts and Kingdom Hearts 2 for Christmas and dad went out and bought the manuals for both games when he got stuck on a certain level. He was so excited that Dad got him some help, he has read both of them 300+ pages, over and over again, learning all of the secrets of the games. He also runs to the mailbox to see if his WWE magazine is here yet. He loves to read that too.
--
Mary King
www.unschoolingsupermom.blogspot.com
